sentences.sContent: He had the ability to write fluent and idiomatic English.
sentences.sCn: 他能够写出流利地道的英语。

sentences.sContent: the idiomatic richness of the Spanish language
sentences.sCn: 西班牙语习语的丰富多样

phrases.pCn: 地道英语；合乎习惯用法的英语

trans.tranOther: typical of the natural way in which someone speaks or writes when they are using their own language
